xxl.core.spatial.cursors
Class PointInputCursor

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor<E>
      xxl.core.cursors.sources.io.InputStreamCursor<E>
          xxl.core.cursors.sources.io.FileInputCursor<Point>
              xxl.core.spatial.cursors.PointInputCursor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterator<Point>, Cursor<Point>
public class PointInputCursor
extends FileInputCursor<Point>

The PointInputCursor constructs an Iterator of Points for a given flat File of Point-Objects.

          DOUBLE_POINT is a constant that indicates the dimensions of a point being of type double

PointInputCursor

public PointInputCursor(Function newPoint,
                        File file,
                        int bufferSize)
Creates a new PointInputCursor.

Parameters:
newPoint - the factory for creating a new point
file - the file containing the input-data
bufferSize - the buffer-size to be allocated for reading the data

PointInputCursor

public PointInputCursor(Function newPoint,
                        File file)
Creates a new PointInputCursor. The bufferSize is set to 1MB bytes.

Parameters:
file - the file containing the input-data
newPoint - the factory for creating a new point

PointInputCursor

public PointInputCursor(File file,
                        int TYPE,
                        int dim,
                        int bufferSize)
Parameters:
file - the file containing the input data
TYPE - the type of the dimension of the point (must be 0,1 or 2)
dim - the dimension of the point
bufferSize - the buffer-size to be allocated for reading the data
